question_text: Which scenario best illustrates the division of responsibility in a PaaS environment?
answer_options: The provider manages the software and the customer manages the network infrastructure
The provider handles OS and infrastructure while the customer builds and maintains the application
The customer installs the OS and the provider runs database backups
Both customer and provider share full hardware access
correct_answer: The provider handles OS and infrastructure while the customer builds and maintains the application
explanation: In PaaS, providers supply the platform and runtime. Customers focus on the application code and logic.
